languages.text: While staying in the 3-cell radius around the Cyber-Mastiff, its Overseer also receives the bonus from {g|f:582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}Battle-Driven{/g} (but not its temporary Wounds).

traits.locale_text: While staying in the 3-cell radius around the Cyber-Mastiff, its Overseer also receives the bonus from {g|f:582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}Battle-Driven{/g} (but not its temporary Wounds).

languages.text: Whenever the cyber-mastiff gains bonuses from {g|f:582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}Combat Reflexes{/g}, if its {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is in a 3-cell radius, they gain these bonuses as well (except the {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}).

traits.locale_text: Whenever the cyber-mastiff gains bonuses from {g|f:582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}Combat Reflexes{/g}, if its {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is in a 3-cell radius, they gain these bonuses as well (except the {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}).

Whenever the cyber-mastiff gains bonuses from {g|f:582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}Combat Reflexes{/g}, if its {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is in a 3-cell radius, they gain these bonuses as well (except the {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}).

Whenever the cyber-mastiff gains bonuses from {g|f:582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}Combat Reflexes{/g}, if its {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is in a 3-cell radius, they gain these bonuses as well (except the {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}).

languages.text: Cada vez que el cibermastín reciba las bonificaciones de {g|f:582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}Reflejos de combate{/g}, si su {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} se halla en un radio de 3 casillas también recibe estas bonificaciones (excepto las {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}).
languages.original_text: Whenever the cyber-mastiff gains bonuses from {g|f:582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}Combat Reflexes{/g}, if its {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is in a 3-cell radius, they gain these bonuses as well (except the {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}).

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el cibermastín reciba las bonificaciones de {g|f:582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}Reflejos de combate{/g}, si su {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} se halla en un radio de 3 casillas también recibe estas bonificaciones (excepto las {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}).

languages.text: 每当生化獒犬通过{g|f:582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}战斗反射{/g}获得加成效果时，如果{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}与它之间的距离不超过3格，则监察官也同样会获得加成效果（不包括{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}）。
languages.original_text: Whenever the cyber-mastiff gains bonuses from {g|f:582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}Combat Reflexes{/g}, if its {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is in a 3-cell radius, they gain these bonuses as well (except the {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}).

traits.locale_text: 每当生化獒犬通过{g|f:582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}战斗反射{/g}获得加成效果时，如果{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}与它之间的距离不超过3格，则监察官也同样会获得加成效果（不包括{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}）。

languages.text: Dès que le cyber-mastiff bénéficie de bonus grâce à {g|f:582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}Réflexes de combat{/g}, si son {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} se trouve dans un rayon de 3 cases, ce dernier en bénéficie également (sauf s'il s'agit de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}).
languages.original_text: Whenever the cyber-mastiff gains bonuses from {g|f:582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}Combat Reflexes{/g}, if its {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is in a 3-cell radius, they gain these bonuses as well (except the {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}).

traits.locale_text: Dès que le cyber-mastiff bénéficie de bonus grâce à {g|f:582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}Réflexes de combat{/g}, si son {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} se trouve dans un rayon de 3 cases, ce dernier en bénéficie également (sauf s'il s'agit de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}).

languages.text: Siber mastif, {g|f:582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}Çatışma Refleksleri{/g} kabiliyetinden her bonus kazandığında {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}'i 3 hücrelik yarıçap içinde ise aynı bonuslardan o da kazanır ({g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanları hariç).
languages.original_text: Whenever the cyber-mastiff gains bonuses from {g|f:582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}Combat Reflexes{/g}, if its {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is in a 3-cell radius, they gain these bonuses as well (except the {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}).

traits.locale_text: Siber mastif, {g|f:582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}Çatışma Refleksleri{/g} kabiliyetinden her bonus kazandığında {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen'i{/g} 3 hücrelik yarıçap içinde ise aynı bonuslardan o da kazanır ({g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanları hariç).

languages.text: Когда кибермастиф получает бонусы от {g|f:582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}Боевых рефлексов{/g}, если его {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} находится в радиусе 3 клеток, он также получает эти бонусы (кроме {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}).
languages.original_text: Whenever the cyber-mastiff gains bonuses from {g|f:582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}Combat Reflexes{/g}, if its {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is in a 3-cell radius, they gain these bonuses as well (except the {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}).

traits.locale_text: Когда кибермастиф получает бонусы от {g|f:582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}Боевых рефлексов{/g}, если его {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} находится в радиусе 3 клеток, он также получает эти бонусы (кроме {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}).

Когда кибермастиф получает бонусы от {g|f:582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}Боевых рефлексов{/g}, если его {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} находится в радиусе 3 клеток, он также получает эти бонусы (кроме {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}).

languages.text: サイバー・マスティフが{g|f:582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}戦闘反射{/g} のボーナスを得るたびに、その{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督者{/g} が半径3セル内にいる場合、彼らもこれらのボーナスを得る（ただし{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g} を除く）。
languages.original_text: Whenever the cyber-mastiff gains bonuses from {g|f:582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}Combat Reflexes{/g}, if its {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is in a 3-cell radius, they gain these bonuses as well (except the {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}).

traits.locale_text: サイバー・マスティフが{g|f:582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}戦闘反射{/g} のボーナスを得るたびに、その{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督者{/g} が半径3セル内にいる場合、彼らもこれらのボーナスを得る（ただし{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g} を除く）。

languages.text: Erhält der Cyber-Mastiff Boni durch {g|f:582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}Kampfreflexe{/g}, wenn sich sein {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} in einem Radius von 3 Feldern aufhält, erhält dieser die Boni ebenfalls (mit Ausnahme der {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporären Wunden{/g}).
languages.original_text: Whenever the cyber-mastiff gains bonuses from {g|f:582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}Combat Reflexes{/g}, if its {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is in a 3-cell radius, they gain these bonuses as well (except the {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}).

traits.locale_text: Erhält der Cyber-Mastiff Boni durch {g|f:582bb17c04754121b4b31647865dfd32}Kampfreflexe{/g}, wenn sich sein {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} in einem Radius von 3 Feldern aufhält, erhält dieser die Boni ebenfalls (mit Ausnahme der {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporären Wunden{/g}).
